document.full_text: despite recommendations that older men stop getting p.s.a. tests to screen for prostate cancers, new research shows that men in their 70s are being screened at nearly twice the rate of men in their 50s.
document.title: when should men stop p.s.a. testing?
lines_and_colors: despite recommendations that older men stop getting p.s.a. tests to screen for prostate cancers, new research shows that men in their 70s are being screened at nearly twice the rate of men in their 50s.
